awards.title: Finalist for Best Branding Event for Marketing Events Awards 2016
awards.description: Integrated 360 degree regional branding campaign that culminated into a highly customized Key Opinion Influencer (KOL) event to drive brand engagement and familiarity.

profile_positions.description:
CLUSE, founded in 2013, is one of the fastest growing watch & accessories brands in the world. Driven by a highly motivated, young and ambitious group of people, CLUSE has been able to become one of the most sought-after watch brands in record time. Headquartered in Amsterdam, CLUSE is part of the Europe Watch Group B.V.

My role (based in Amsterdam)
- Head of the China department, responsible for the brand’s market entry strategy
- Oversee CLUSE’s operation in China and lead all aspects of the business in the market
- Develop strategy and plan for stores across multiple e-commerce platforms (Tmall, JD.com, TikTok China, LittleRedBook)
- Drive the planning and management of CLUSE’s marketing strategy including celebrity collaborations, KOL/influencer marketing, social media and PR 
- Plan and drive integrated marketing campaigns, events and partnerships
- Manage external trade partners 
- Lead and mentor teams in both Amsterdam and Shanghai
- P&L management 
- Report directly to the CEO
profile_positions.title: General Manager China

profile_positions.description:
iP2Entertainment is a diversified international family entertainment and media company, built around a core business of Branded Family Entertainment Centers (BFECs). BFECs are unique entertainment destinations combining the most popular international brands (including National Geographic, Mattel and Dreamworks Animation Studios) with cutting edge media-based technology and attractions. 

Key Areas of Focus
- Developing and executing iP2's global marketing strategies
- Brand positioning
- Communication plan
- Event planning and management
- Managing the commercial relationships with iP2's partners in North America, Mexico and Greater China
profile_positions.title: Global Marketing Director

profile_positions.description:
China’s largest destination resort. Part of the pre-opening team of this $1.6 billion integrated destination resort with 1300 rooms, 21 restaurants & bars, marine water park and entertainment. Invested by Fosun Group and managed by Kerzner International, this is Atlantis’ second resort after Atlantis, The Palm in Dubai. 

Key Areas of Focus 

- Head of the Brand Marketing team
- Develop and strategize the destination’s pre-opening marketing plan to position the brand and drive awareness 
- Collaborate with key stakeholders to develop marketing events calendar and plan tactical campaigns to drive visitation and spend
- In-market brand activation to generate media interest and awareness among identified target audience
- Acquisition and management of key partnerships with banks, online travel agents, luxury automotive brands and airlines to support the resort’s marketing objectives 
- Develop the property’s brand guidelines
- Lead a team of 10 marketeers and graphic designers

Key Achievements

- Launched the resort’s pre-opening brand campaign “Where Water Meets Wonder” with offline, online & social media strategy; successfully identified target audience profile, developed creative assets in both digital and video formats, end to end management of media and creative agency; the brand campaign successfully introduced Atlantis the brand and positioned itself as China’s leading integrated destination resort with incremental pre-opening bookings 
- Developed the resorts’ marketing collaterals across all business units including Rooms, F&B, Marine WaterPark, Spa and Sales team
- Planned the resort’s marketing activities and events calendar, collaborating with key stakeholders with the aim to achieve targeted business goals
- Successfully planned the resort’s first brand event (pre-opening roadshows) to raise brand awareness and generate PR value; the event was executed in 4 major cities in China (Shanghai, Beijing, Chengdu, Guangzhou) targeting trade partners and media
profile_positions.title: Director of Brand Marketing

profile_positions.description:
Marina Bay Sands is an integrated destination featuring Singapore's most iconic hotel for the world's largest rooftop infinity pool, celebrity chef dining, and a wide range of shopping and entertainment options.

Key Areas of Focus

- Responsible for the destination’s regional marketing and strategic partnership efforts across the APAC region with a strong focus on China & SEA to drive brand awareness and visitation.
- Drive breakthrough marketing strategies and launch initiatives that target existing customers, prospective customers and deliver greater brand recognition and perception
- Drive the planning, development and implementation of strategies and ensure proper execution in the market
- Manage the ongoing planning and implementation of brand communication and advertising 
- Responsible for acquisition and day to day management of key regional partnerships to support the destination's marketing objectives

Key Achievements

- Successfully planned and managed MBS's first brand campaign "Never Settle", in partnership with its brand ambassador David Beckham. Goal was to position MBS as the lifestyle destination of choice for Dining, Shopping, Attractions and Entertainment for the targeted markets. Managed to increase brand awareness and familiarity, drive new and repeat visitations and drive increase in spend on-property.
- The brand event " Beyond Expectations" was curated to bring to life the campaign experience to drive desire and bookings from the Chinese audience for the end year holiday period in 2016. 24 top influencers were invited from Shanghai and Beijing to experience the property, across dining, shopping, fashion, entertainment and hotel, with a special appearance of David Beckham. 
- Successfully developed marketing partnerships with UnionPay International, JCB Credit Japan, Credit Saison and Singapore Airlines
- Planned and managed tactical campaigns during key periods such as Christmas, Chinese New Year to drive visitation and increase spend.
profile_positions.title: Regional Marketing Manager - APAC

company.name: Diaoyutai MGM Hospitality 钓鱼台美高梅酒店集团

profile_positions.company: Diaoyutai MGM Hospitality 钓鱼台美高梅酒店集团
profile_positions.description:
MGM International’s first resort in China, this beach front Vegas-inspired dining, nightlife and entertainment resort offers 675 hotel rooms, 12 F&B outlets and 4000 square meters conference space.
 
Key Areas of Focus

- Responsible for this entertainment resort’s external and internal marketing communications in areas of rooms, F&B, Spa and entertainment, report directly to GM
- Establish and maintain solid relationships with both local and regional media: online, print and social
- Managing a team of 5 marketeers

Key Achievements

- Developed and managed the resort’s flagship e-shop on Tmall to generate direct channel revenue in Rooms, F&B and Spa 
- Planned and executed an aggressive social media campaign on WeChat with strong focus on content marketing to promote F&B and Rooms
- Developed partnerships to increase brand awareness in target markets: for example, venue sponsor for the World Poker Tour National China Tournament 2013 and RUFF (Ranik Ultimate Fighting Federation (RUFF), the first Chinese mixed martial arts (MMA)
profile_positions.title: Director of Marketing Communications

profile_positions.description:
Fairmont Peace Hotel is a ‘luxurious Art-Deco masterpiece’ opened in 1929, a historical landmark hotel situated in Shanghai, China offering 270 distinctive guestrooms, 11 F&B outlets and the city’s most celebrated Jazz Lounge

Key Areas of Focus

- Responsible for this iconic historical hotel’s 11 F&B outlets’ marketing initiatives 
- Developing hotel marketing content, press release in both English and Mandarin
- Building and maintaining solid relationships with both local and international media
- Managing hotel’s website content and social media presence

Key Achievements

- Developed partnerships with various luxury brands to increase brand awareness and gain access to new customers cost effectively. For example, partnership with luxury lifestyle brand Shanghai Tang for Autumn/Winter VIP only preview made exclusive only at Fairmont Peace Hotel’s signature Chinese Suite
- Successfully managed and coordinated the ILTM (International Luxury Travel Market) official welcome reception event in 2012 with more than 800 guests
- Created and co-hosted Shanghai’s first ever celebrity charity ball event in a short period of notice within budget and reached target revenue. This event was hosted by the world renowned celebrity dancer Jing Xing. Gained national PR exposure for the hotel through this event.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Communications Manager

profile_positions.description:
Pre-opening team member of Shanghai’s most iconic entertainment venue including a club, lounge and restaurant. 

Key Areas of Focus

- Developing partnerships with luxury lifestyle brands, 5 star hotels and private networks of high net worth individuals to drive membership sign-ups
- Organizing high profile exclusive events to creat buzz and maintain/increase PR exposure 

Key Achievements

- Achieved an overall of US$2million of fund raising pre-opening 
- Successfully acquired over 700 memberships and managed the entire membership program
- Ferrari "California" car launch & Jet Li "One Foundation" charity event 
- Lamborghini owners private cocktail reception 
- Grammy award singer John Legend's official concert after party
- 12th Shanghai International Film Festival opening and closing reception. VIP guests include: Halle Berry, award wining director Danny Boyle, music legend Quincy Jones and actress Michelle Yeoh
profile_positions.title: Membership Manager
